key.name: hide-identity
key.description: If set to true, the system will make an effort to not divulge the user’s identity on screen or on the network.

key.name: show-full-name-in-top-bar
key.summary: Show full name in the user menu
key.description: Whether the users full name is shown in the user menu or not.

key.name: remove-old-trash-files
key.summary: Whether to remove old files from the trash automatically
key.description: If TRUE, automatically remove files from the trash when they are older than “old-files-age” days.

key.name: remove-old-temp-files
key.summary: Whether to remove old temporary files automatically
key.description: If TRUE, automatically remove temporary files when they are older than “old-files-age” days.

key.name: old-files-age
key.summary: Number of days to keep trash and temporary files
key.description: Consider trash and temporary files old after this many days.

key.name: remember-recent-files
key.summary: Whether to remember recently used files
key.description: If FALSE, applications will not remember recently used files.

key.name: recent-files-max-age
key.summary: Number of days to remember recently used files for
key.description: Recently used files will be remembered for this many days. If set to 0, recent files will not be remembered; if set to -1, they will be retained indefinitely.

key.name: remember-app-usage
key.description: If FALSE, application usage will not be monitored and recorded.

key.name: send-software-usage-stats
key.summary: Send statistics when applications are removed or installed
key.description: If FALSE, no anonymous installation or removal information will be sent to the vendor.

key.name: report-technical-problems
key.summary: Send reports of technical problems to the vendor
key.description: If TRUE, anonymized reports will be sent automatically to the vendor.

key.name: disable-microphone
key.summary: Don’t allow applications to access the microphone
key.description: If TRUE, applications should not use the microphone.

key.name: disable-camera
key.summary: Don’t allow applications to access the camera
key.description: If TRUE, applications should not use the camera.

key.name: disable-sound-output
key.summary: Don’t allow applications to output sound
key.description: If TRUE, applications should not make sound.

key.name: usb-protection
key.description: If the USBGuard service is present and this setting is enabled, USB devices will be protected as configured in the usb-protection-level setting.

key.name: usb-protection-level
key.summary: When USB devices should be rejected
key.description: If set to “lockscreen”, only when the lock screen is present new USB devices will be rejected; if set to “always”, all new USB devices will always be rejected.
